Description:
IN/SL/GCU/28102021/01, 312032230 - You have failed to provide teaching staff on animal care courses with suitable and sufficient information, instruction, and training on biological agent Cryptosporidium.

IN/SL/GCU/28102021/02,  312032334 - You have failed to make appropriate arrangement to effectively plan, organise, control, monitor and review your preventative and protective measures to ensure that risks to health and safety, namely exposure to a biological agent, Cryptosporidium, are adequately controlled when students attend practical animal husbandry sessions at Rhadyr Farm.
